short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and return to a scroll position on ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension acts like a bookmark for ChatGPT, saving your spot in the conversation so you don't have to scroll back up every time you interact. 
Now you can revisit an earlier part of the conversation with ease, freeing you up to "go down the rabbit hole", ask questions, or branch out new ideas without getting overwhelmed or sidetracked whenever ChatGPT responds with a wall of text.
Useful for research, writing, coding, or just having long chats with an AI so you can feel like someone really gets you. I’m just here to help, no judgments.
If you like this extension and want more features like customizable boxes or multiple saved spots, let me know!
And if you’d like to support this and other projects, consider donating: [Donate here](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=V9VQDE3XNBQZU)

[Privacy Policy](https://shoopal.github.io/scroll-saver-privacy-policy/)
